xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StatementByDirectorResponsible: The company deals in products which has practically zero environmental impact. It has always been the objective of the company to ensure social equity and to ensure better life to its stakeholders specifically its employees. The company has always ensured proper statutory compliances in all its activities
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfSpecifiedCommitteeOfT: Under the oversight of Board, CSR committee makes decision on sustainability related issues.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:AntiCorruptionOrAntiBriberyPol: Alert Overseers ensures no corruption or bribe takes place.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOccupationalHealthAnd: The Company has established an Occupational Health and Safety (OH&S) management system which covers all manufacturing units, and non-manufacturing areas like corporate office, regional offices and area offices
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DesclosureOfTheProcessesUsedTo: The company deals in gold where there are no significant risks or hazards, however the company trains its workers on a regular basis with regard to safety precautions to be taken to avoid any risks or hazards in the existing situation.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMeasuresTakenByTheE: The work place is cleaned every day and the work place is maintained in a healthy manner. All safety measures are undertaken to ensure and safe work place.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfMeasuresUndertakenByT: We obtain the required declaration from them.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheProcessesForIdentif: The Company in its regular departmental meetings, identifies the stakeholders and their importance, if any department of the Company feels that under the circumstances, new stakeholders have been identified then such stakeholders would be added to the group.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ProvideTheProcessesForConsulta: The inputs from stakeholders are provided by the senior management to the CSR and Sustainability Committee and Stakeholders Relationship Committee, which, in turn, prioritises and places these feedback to the board of Directors
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfInstancesAsToHowTheIn: Yes. Internally each dept reviews the environment aspect and impact of the activities, identifies negative impacts and appropriate actions are taken.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfInstancesOfEngagement: The action plans for mitigation are adopted, monitored and reviewed by the HODs and presented to the factory Head annually. In case of society/community the inputs are translated into CSR programs.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOtherFrequencyOfEngag: Need based and as per regulations

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheInternalMechanismsI: The Company has a vigil mechanism and vigil blower policy under which the employee are encouraged to report violation of the code of conduct in confidence and without fear of retaliation.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:MechanismsToPreventAdverseCons: The Company has a vigil mechanism and vigil blower policy under which the employee are encouraged to report violation of the code of conduct in confidence and without fear of retaliation.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfABusinessProcessBeing: There have been no human rights grievances/complaints.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfTheScopeAndCoverageOf: Human rights due-diligence is an integral part of the Company since its inception. We continue to comply with all statutory requirements for the same.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfCoverageAndImplementa: Company is using its own borewell water
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfProjectRelatedToReduc: Our process does not generate any additional industrial waste.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsToReceive: Nomination and Remuneration Committee interacts with community and takes care of the issue in consultation with Board.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsInPlaceTo: We have a online system from all the retail showrooms to the head office for receiving and responding to consumer complaints and feedback.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StepsTakenToInformAndEducateCo: All the products are gold hence no steps required.
